issues.title: Unpaved Ground - Poor Condition
issues.description: Warehouse not finally paved - soil is sandy, and with rain the situation has become extremely bad
issues.description_ar: المستودع غير معبد بشكل نهائي - التربة رملية، ومع المطر أصبح الوضع سيئاً للغاية

issues.title: Pipes in Poor Condition
issues.description: All pipes are in poor condition, filled with rust
issues.description_ar: جميع الأنابيب في حالة سيئة، مليئة بالصدأ

recommendations: URGENT: Pave warehouse ground to prevent further deterioration
Assess all pipes for usability - segregate usable from scrap
Consider covered storage for sensitive items
source_report: Report on the Visit to the Eastern Region.docx
